title: Auction App
text: Simple auction app, where users can upload item, bid, set auction time. Created with NodeJs and ReactJs

title: Rock Paper Scissors
text: Simple game app. User can play game 'Rock Paper Scissors' vs computer.

title: Fight Club
text: Game app, where player plays vs computer (random animal). Player can choose character, weapon. When player wins fight, he will get money and is able to buy potions. Potions are two different types: healing and with various effects (add strength, add stamina and etc.)

title: Make It Easy
text: Html project. This is very simple front-end framework. User can use styled buttons, a lot of flex classes, margins, paddings.

title: Siulyk24
text: Group project. It is like market, users can sell and buy items. When you find item which you want, you must offer price, then seller can accept it or decline. If he accepts, he gets buyer's contact. Users can write reviews, messages to admin, change profile picture.
